ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 3.2 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Anyone know what colour(s) the Melodic, Resonant and Troubador armours are? I d also like to add a difficulty rating for each... ie, Lambent would be ~
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:47 PM 4/24/2001 -0400, you wrote:

>Add Sionachie's Partisan to the Bard-only weapons. Rare drop from Caller of
>Sathir in Karnor's Castle. Piercing 9/19, Int+2, Cha+6, MR+5.
>
>Add Melodic, Resonant and Troubador to the list of Bard-only armour. All
>from Velious. Melodic drops in the Plane of Growth. Resonant and Troubador
>are quested in Thurgadin and Kael Drakkel (sp?) respectively.
>
>A new Bard-specific website is www.eqdiva.com


Anyone know what colour(s) the Melodic, Resonant and Troubador armours are?

I'd also like to add a "difficulty rating" for each... ie, Lambent would be
~ 20th, because some items can be soloed for at that level, others can be
quested for with help from a guild, etc. Don't need exact numbers - just a
ballpark (yes, I know that there are 1st level twinks in full lambent, and
60th level players without any planar armour - just going for an average,
thanks!)

And thank you for all the additions!

Talies
